level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-83, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28-3101.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 11 of the Uniform Fraudulent Transfer Act. See Volume 7A, Part II Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
